name: NL Community
description:
NL Community is a sci-fi racing game for Windows.

It's a single type racing. The objective is to go around the course three times.

It has 12 courses.

- Control

Accel/Start: [Z](A Button)

Brake/Back: [X](B Button)

Handle/Select: Arrow keys

Supported operating systems: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
